pageContext.claim: “This is my promise to each and every one of you: I'm hearing that more and more African Americans are supporting our Republican policy agenda because they see the results that we're delivering.”
pageContext.analysis: The president may be hearing something else, but polls show his approval rating among black Americans has been dropping, not increasing. Only 10 percent of black voters approve of the president, according to a report from Gallop. The report pointed out, “It is fair to say that Trump's progress toward a substantially higher share of the black vote than he got in 2016 is in severe doubt if he maintains a 10% black approval rating.”
